name: @asyncapi/html-template
description: HTML template for the AsyncAPI generator.
author: Fran Mendez <fmvilas@gmail.com> (fmvilas.com)

scripts.//develop:install: Force ag to install your local html-template source code
scripts.generate:assets: npm run copy:sources && npm run generate:readme:toc

sidebarOrganization.description: Defines how the sidebar should be organized. 'byTags' to categorize operations by tags in the root of the document, `byTagsNoRoot` does the same but for pub/sub tags.

baseHref.description: Sets the base URL for links and forms.

version.description: Override the version of your application provided under `info.version` location in the specification file.

singleFile.description: If set this parameter to true generate single html file with scripts and styles inside

outFilename.description: The name of the output HTML file

pdf.description: Set to `true` to get index.pdf generated next to your index.html

pdfTimeout.description: The timeout (in ms) used to generate the pdf

config.description: Stringified JSON or a path to a JSON file to override the default React component config. The config override is merged with the default config using the [JSON Merge Patch](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7386) algorithm.
